text: Yakhana ami bani-isara'ilera kacha theke angikara nilama ye, tomara allaha chara kara'o upasana karabe na, pita-mata, atniya-sbajana, etima o dina-daridradera sathe sadbyabahara karabe, manusake sat kathabarta balabe, namaya pratistha karabe ebam yakata debe, takhana saman'ya kayekajana chara tomara mukha phiriye nile, tomara'i agrahyakari.
